review.practice_name: Bloom IVF Centre

survey_response.review_text:
Subject: Heartfelt Gratitude for Your Exceptional Care
Dear Dr. Hrishikesh Pai,,
I hope this message finds you well. We wanted to take a moment to express our deepest gratitude for the incredible care and expertise you provided throughout our IVF journey. Your dedication, compassion, and unwavering commitment to our case have made all the difference.

Today, we are overjoyed to share the wonderful news that the IVF procedure was successful, and we are now expecting. This journey has been filled with emotions, and your support has been a beacon of hope during the challenging times. Your guidance, reassurance, and the personalized attention you gave us have been invaluable.

Your professionalism, combined with your genuine kindness, has created an environment that allowed us to feel supported and confident throughout the entire process. We are immensely grateful for your expertise and the positive impact you've had on our lives.

Thank you for helping us achieve our dream of starting a family. Your skill, warmth, and encouragement have made this journey not only medically successful but also emotionally uplifting. We are blessed to have had you as our doctor.

Wishing you continued success in your work and heartfelt thanks once again for being an integral part of this life-changing experience.

With sincere appreciation,******* ***** *** ****** *********************** **** ******* ****** ** *** ******* *********** *** ******* ********* ** ** ** ***** **** ***** *** *** ****** ** ***** ****** ****** ** ***** **** ****** ****** ** ** ********** ****** ** ********** ** *** **** **** ******** ****** **** ** *** ** **** **** ***** *** **** ******* ***** ** ***** ***** ** ***** **** *********** ** **** **** **** **** ******** **** ** ****** ****** **** **** *** **** **** ** *** ** ** ****** ********* *** **** ** ** ** ****** ** *** **** ** ****** ******* ** *** *** *** ** *********** *** ** ***** **** ****** *** ** **** *** *** **** *********** ******* ** **** **** ** ********* ***** **** ** ****** ********* ************ *** **** ******** ******* ** *** ****** ** *** ******* ***** **** ** ***** **** **** ********* ** ***** ******* ** *********** ***** **** ** ****** ** *** ** **** ********** ** ***** **** ** **** ********* ****** ** *** **** ***** ************ **** **** ** ***** **** ** ***** **** *** ***** *** **** ** *** ******** **** ***** ******** ** ********** ** ** ****** ** * **** ********** *** ** *** ***** ** ***** ********* *** ** ** ********** ***** *** ** ********* *** ** ** ***** ****** ********** *** *** ****** ***** ** ***** **** *** ** **** ***** **** ** ***** ** ****** *** **** ** *** ** *** *** ******* *************** ****** ** *********** ***** ** *********************

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Where to start, amazing team, amazing experience, fabulous doctors. I was diagnosed with secondary amenorrhea and had stopped menstruating, saw Dr. Hrishikesh pai as I was trying for conceiving since last 2 years with always a failure in my lap. He and his his team, my favourite Dr. Meenu handa came to my rescue. Not only she explained me so well in terms of what’s been happening to my body, she always told me to keep hope that I can be a mother. After going to numerous doctors, spending lacs, I met this amazing doctor who in 2nd IVF cycle, miraculously made me pregnant and to my surprise with twins. I now have 2 beautiful daughters, who are healthy and happy babies. All thanks to Dr. Hrishikesh pai and Dr. Meenu handa. Love you guys.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: ”No words can express how grateful I am to have Dr. Sunita arora and her amazing team care for me during my IVF journey. Everyone was so caring and detail oriented every step of the way. Dr. Sunita collaborates with the patient and the nursing/lab team to provide efficient, timely results.Special thanks to Dr Sunita Arora for giving me hope and making my dreams come true. I am so glad I got referred to you and that you didn't give up on me.  I would highly recommend this center for any friends and family wishing to start a family.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: We had a wonderful experience with Dr Pai and his team of doctors, especially Dr Meenu Handa- whom we would rate highly with regards to thier subject knowledge, diagnostic abilities and bedside manner. We were always made to feel very comfortable through what can be a very physically, mentally and emotionally draining process. At every stage they spend time with us explaining each process and  what to expect. Thanks to Dr Pai and his team we were able to fulfill our dream of becoming parents and we wish them all the best to help many more couples like us fulfill thier dreams of becoming parents

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Its a miracle!! Like nothing is IMPOSSIBLE for Dr. Hrishikesh pai. Words cannot begin to thank you for all that you did for us. You are such a great doctor and we are so glad that you were the one to help us achieve out goal of adding to our family.Thanks a lot!!

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: The instructions for taking medicines were clear.  the hospital was nearby which helped during the initial processes I had to take about100 injections. All efforts were made to maximize my chances of a successful pregnancy including regular ultrasounds and additional injections

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Doctors Care made me feel that I was in safe hands. we appreciate doctor's patience to give satisfactory answers to all our questions. Doctor suggested to follow precautions,risks during initial time of pregnancy and during one year of treatment and guided about healthy diet and exercise time to time, which are very helpful. It is being long time waited for children to come in our hands and that acomplished here. We are happy to have twin babies 👶👶🍼.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: The very first day when we met Dr. Sunita, we got quite impressed about her friendly and patient hearing about our problem and anxiety. We were more enlightened when subsequently we met Dr. Pai along with Dr.Sunita. Our experience towards the pre and post IVF treatment and procedures had been very satisfactory with the positive end result. We are happy to have been blessed with a baby girl.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: I would highly recommended Dr Hrishikesh pai and his team provided my friend with exceptional care. My friend had an amazing experience with him and have already started referring her to all our friends and in social circles who may need his service Thanks.

review.practice_name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Dr. Hrishkesh Pai and his team provided us with exceptional care. From the day we walked through that clinic to day we were done with our treatment the service was just excellent. For us everything worked on the first cycle and I am now 6 weeks pregnant with twins. I recommend this clinic 100%

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: The treatment, overall experience with Dr Pai and Dr Meenu was great... Through out the process they understood our side of the story and challenges and given us all the required information and support.. We always felt in that we were in safe hands. The entire team was always there for us to resolve our query and to keep us motivated, which usually is a challenge as we have been struggling with infertility for a long time. My hearflet thanks  to Meenu Mam and her team for making the biggest dream of our life come true!!

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Dr.H. Pai and his team (esp. Dr.Meenu Handa) are very professional and experienced in their field. Each member of the team has supported & guided us about the process throughout, from beginning till end. They listened to all our queries and responded aptly and kept us positive & motivated always. We visited other hospitals as well prior meeting them but we found the team confident and much more professional. Hence we decided to move forward with them. We have recieved positive results after coming to them. I would like to thank Fortis & Bloom IVF Gurgaon team.

review.practice_name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text:
Dr Pai, Dr. Meenu Handa Dr. Shweta and their team (Mamta, Gurpreet, Kamani, Dinesh and all others) at Gurgaon Fortis is more than God to us.

We were trying for over 5 years and were under consultation at CloudNine, Gurgaon but then finally got to know about this team.. They took their own time to understand the problem, also tried to get natural pregnancy and finally took us through IVF.

I just dont have any words to thank them in any possible way.. All i can say is  we are in debt for rest of our life... Thanks to this wonderful team for taking us through this journey.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: I had gone for my daughte's treatment. Doctor and staff is very friendly and helpful. Overall it was a great experience.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: Iam very satisfied with the treatment. I have been trying from 1-2 year with bo result.  Here I got result in first cycle.  Higly appreciated team and doctor efforts

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: After multiple IVF Failures we were finally blessed with our bundle of joy.. all thanks to Dr Hrishikesh Pai for his expertise and all his help. God bless him with all the success in the world.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: Dr pai is well experienced doctor in the field of infertily. i have conceived in my first cycle. i recommend every infertile couple to visit this centre. very coperative and comfortable atmosphere.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Hospital

survey_response.review_text:
Dr Paii.  is a wonderful person .
He is a pioneer in his field and has excellent expertise in dealing with difficult cases .
He cleared all my doubts and gave me the confidence to move ahead for treatment with a positive attitude

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis LaFemme Hospital

survey_response.review_text: Thank you so much for helping us grow our family ! You have all been very patient with us. We were hesitant to repeat IVF treatment after one unsuccessful cycle elsewhere. We are so thankful we gave it another chance and you are a part of our story . Thank you for making us two of the happiest people on earth.

survey_response.review_text: Respected sir,  firstly thank you for dr.h.k. pai sir for treatment of ivf to my wife. Blessings of God and devotional efforts of dr.pai and team , got a baby boy. Our families are very happy , it is not  possible to explain of pleasure .    Regards  ajay Singh  lucknow up.

review.practice_name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: Dr Hrishikesh Pai is a doctor with miracle...he is the best doctor for infertility and  IVF patient s...my case was very complicated....with his trust and confidence today I am blessed with happiness in my home...whatever I say is not enough....The FMRI bloom Gurgaon team, staff and all doctors are fantastic....I want to thanks Dr Meenu handa for her support and care she has provided during my treatment journey.....Thank you for everything!!

review.practice_name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: I am soo thankful to Dr Hrishikesh Pai and Dr Meenu Handa for their support...Today because of them i am blessed with twin babies and i m really greatful for making us parents and experience this parenthood...the doctor team and support staff at gurgaon fortis is excellent and i recommend to all couples who are looking for infertility treatment..my best wishes to the team always....thankyou soo much for everything!!

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: He is a great Doctor. After 12 years of marriage me and my husband got fortunate enough to give birth of a beautiful baby. All thanks goes to Dr.Hrishikesh pai sir. We had a wonderful experience with him. We would highly recommend to those who want this treatment.

review.practice_name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: There are not enough kind words to let you know how much we appreciate Dr. Hrishikesh Pai and his Team. At first we were really anxious to see a male doctor but he never made us feel uncomfortable. The respect and politeness with which he has always treated us, led to our trust and confidence in him. Thanku soo much Dr. Hrishikesh PAi and entire Team!!!

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: My sister was having infertility since 9 years of marriage...she has been gone through 2 miscarriages previously... But after visiting bloom IVF she conceived with two beautiful twins... We are soo much grateful to Dr.  Pai and team for all the efforts they have made to give us biggest happiness of our life....

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: I am very thankful to Dr Pai and team for the care and support they has given us....we were struggling with Infertility for 5 years....today we are blessed with beautiful twin babies....words are less to describe the efforts and care taken by Bloom team....I will recommend to all the couple's struggling with Infertility to consult him....

survey_response.review_text: Doctor is quite friendly with patient, explained the process well, & straight to point. Also special thanks to Dr. Meenu Handa & her entire team for their support & help during the entire process.

review.practice_name: Fortis Bloom IVF Centre, Fortis Memorial Research Institute

survey_response.review_text: We would like to thank Dr. Hrishikesh Pai & his team who helped us to achieve parenthood. I must say he is a great doctor & best IVF specialist in India. We are happy to announce the arrival of our beautiful twins. Thank you once again!!

survey_response.review_text: Dr. Pai is well experienced in this field and can be trusted without doubts. He is friendly and doesn't let you become anxious or nervous during the procedure rather makes it very smooth. I highly recommend him.

survey_response.review_text: I m very much thankful for Dr Pai and team especially Dr Sunita ,who gave me 100% success through  IVF,now I have a twins baby as a god gifts, I m also thankful to Allah
